text: Aiouea is a genus of shrubs and trees in the family Lauraceae. It is native to tropical forests and montane forests of North and South America. ==Taxonomy== The following species are currently recognized: * Aiouea acarodomatifera Kosterm. * Aiouea angulata Kosterm. * Aiouea benthamiana Mez * Aiouea bracteata Kosterm. * Aiouea costaricensis (Mez) Kosterm. * Aiouea dubia Mez * Aiouea grandifolia van der Werff * Aiouea guatemalensis (Lundell) Renner * Aiouea guianensis Aubl. * Aiouea impressa (Meisn.) Kosterm. * Aiouea inconspicua van der Werff * Aiouea laevis (Nees ex Mart.) Kosterm. * Aiouea lehmannii (O.C.Schmidt) Renner * Aiouea longipetiolata van der Werff * Aiouea macedoana Vattimo * Aiouea maguireana (C.K.Allen) Renner * Aiouea obscura van der Werff * Aiouea opaca van der Werff * Aiouea parvissima (Lundell) Renner * Aiouea piauhyensis (Meisn.) Mez * Aiouea saligna Meisn. * Aiouea talamancensis W.C.Burger * Aiouea tomentella (Mez) Renner * Aiouea trinervis Meisn. * Aiouea vexatrix van der Werff ==References== Category:Laurales genera Category:Neotropical realm flora Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Jean Baptiste Christian Fusée-Aublet
title: Aiouea
